name: SmartFitness Tracker
about: A sleek fitness tracker that monitors heart rate, sleep, and step count. Features a waterproof design and 7-day battery life.

aboutSections.title: Product Details
aboutSections.description: A high-tech fitness band designed for everyday use, crafted with skin-friendly material and built-in sensors to give you insights into your daily activity and wellness. Syncs easily with both Android and iOS.

aboutSections.title: Specifications
aboutSections.description: Battery life: 7 days | Water Resistance: IP68 | Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.0

aboutSections.title: Directions
aboutSections.description: Charge fully before first use. Wear snugly for accurate heart rate monitoring.

aboutSections.title: Warranty
aboutSections.description: Includes a 6-month warranty against hardware defects.

name: Aroma Diffuser Lamp
about: A 2-in-1 essential oil diffuser and night lamp with soft LED lighting and ultrasonic misting technology.

aboutSections.title: Product Details
aboutSections.description: Combining aromatherapy with soft ambient lighting, this diffuser helps create a relaxing atmosphere in any room. Great for bedrooms, offices, or yoga sessions.

aboutSections.title: Specifications
aboutSections.description: Tank Capacity: 300ml | LED Colors: 7 | Auto Shut-Off: Yes

aboutSections.title: Directions
aboutSections.description: Add water and a few drops of essential oil. Turn on and select misting mode.

name: CleanBright Electric Toothbrush
about: A rechargeable toothbrush with sonic vibration, 3 cleaning modes, and a smart 2-minute timer for dentist-level hygiene.

aboutSections.title: Product Details
aboutSections.description: Designed by dental experts, this toothbrush gives you a complete oral clean with minimal effort. Replaceable heads and IPX7 waterproofing make it ideal for home and travel.

aboutSections.title: Specifications
aboutSections.description: Battery: 30-day life | Modes: Clean, Sensitive, Massage | Waterproof: IPX7

aboutSections.title: Directions
aboutSections.description: Charge fully before use. Brush each quadrant for 30 seconds as directed by timer pulses.

aboutSections.title: Warranty
aboutSections.description: Comes with 1-year product warranty and 6 months on brush heads.
